| Nome     | Abreviatura | Factor      |
| -------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| KiloByte | KB          | 10³ Bytes  |
| MegaByte | MB          | 10⁶ Bytes  |
| GigaByte | GB          | 10⁹ Bytes  |
| TeraByte | TB          | 10¹² Bytes |
| PetaByte | PB          | 10¹⁵ Bytes |
| ExaByte  | EB          | 10¹⁸ Bytes |
